entry.title: psyched!
entry.content:
I'm psyched, I'm now T minus ~20 hours away from the start of my journey around Southern Africa, loading my physical backpack and unloading my mental one.

For the next few weeks I don't expect to have internet access. I'll be back on January 19th.

And yes, I'll repeat the cliché (hey, they are clichés for a reason, right?)

"Travel is fatal to prejudice, bigotry, and narrow-mindedness." - Mark Twain

test
